summary: If you play a khajiit character and you where disappointed that there where no female khajiit companions well this is the mod for you
descriptionHtml:
theres not much to it it just changes Lydia into a khajiit my first mod i just used the skyrim npc editor and if you want to use my mod (i don\'t see why you would need to) you can i really dont care you don\'t need to give me credit

:install::
drop everything from the winrar file into the data file in ProgramFiles(x86)/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data then check it in the data file in the launcher
::uninstall::
just uncheck it in the data files in the launcher

if you have any problems just lemme know and i will try my best to fix it
author: Qball1172
